67c541fcb032bbdb530201be Description: A 5 inch top rail for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Allows installation of various optics. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.
67c54210d0538d12ec036c0e Description: A top rail for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Allows installation of various optics. Manufactured by XS Sights.
67c5422726265106dd0697a2 Name: M1895/MXLR XS Marlin Ghost Ring rear sight
67c5422726265106dd0697a2 Description: A Ghost Ring type rear sight for M1895 and compatibles. Manufactured by XS Sights.
67c5424826265106dd0697a4 Description: A 5-round .308 ME tube magazine for the Marlin MXLR rifle.
67c5425e26265106dd0697a7 Description: A 24 inch .308 ME barrel for the Marlin MXLR rifle.
67c54270b032bbdb530201c2 Description: A standard front sight for the Marlin MXLR rifle.
67c5427eac40c364490664f6 Name: M1895/MXLR XS Marlin Ghost front sight
67c5427eac40c364490664f6 Description: A Ghost type front sight for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by XS Sights.
67c5428ab032bbdb530201c4 Description: A standard rear sight for the Marlin MXLR rifle.
67c5429fac40c364490664f8 Name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision M-LOK handguard
67c5429fac40c364490664f8 Description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.
67c542aeb032bbdb530201c6 Description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Magpul.
67c542baac40c36449066500 Name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision COSTA M-LOK handguard
67c542baac40c36449066500 Description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.
67c542c126265106dd0697ab Description: A standard handguard for the Marlin MXLR rifle.
67c542ecac40c36449066508 Name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision COSTA top rail
67c542ecac40c36449066508 Description: A top rail for the COSTA handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.
67c6de3ce39861860909e8e5 Description: The classic Marlin 1895 lever-action rifle in the MXLR (Marlin Express LEVERevolution) variant. A modern take on the timeless Henry-style lever-action. Comes in a chrome finish and chambered for the special .308 Marlin Express cartridge.
67cad1ec19b006e9e50f44d6 Description: Une récompense pour la progression dans le BattlePass de la saison 0. Elle contient divers équipements pour vous aider à survivre et à tuer dans le dur monde de Tarkov, mais il vous faut d'abord trouver un moyen de l'ouvrir.
67cad3226bf74131800752b7 Description: Une récompense pour la progression dans le BattlePass de la saison 0. Elle contient divers équipements pour vous aider à survivre et à tuer dans le dur monde de Tarkov. Le verrou a été grossièrement forcé, ce qui signifie qu'il n'y a plus rien entre vous et le contenu de cette mallette.
67d0576f29f580ebc10efd08 Description: Le fusil de précision semi-automatique antimatériel AK-50 est un projet expérimental unique en son genre, adaptant la plateforme Kalachnikov à l'utilisation de la cartouche .50 BMG. L'AK-50 offre une pénétration et une portée exceptionnelles, en faisant un fusil de précision redoutablement puissant. Ce prototype a été développé par le fabricant d'armes et vidéaste YouTube Brandon Herrera et son équipe dans le cadre de The AK Guy LTD.
67d2c26a504767dad30a9338 Description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.
67d2c2aec4d4d19af00f9ba8 Description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.
67d3ed3271c17ff82e0a5b0b Description: Cette mallette est la solution ultime au problème d'accumulation de diverses clés dans la planque, permettant de les stocker toutes au même endroit.
67d416e19bd76ef20f0e743b Description: Un capot comportant un rail Picatinny pour l'AK-50, permettant l'installation d'optiques. Produit par The AK Guy LTD.
67d4178bffb910d21f04720a Name: Canon de 24" calibre .50 BMG pour AK-50
67d4178bffb910d21f04720a Description: Un canon de 24 pouces (612 mm) pour l'AK-50, produit par The AK Guy LTD.
67d417c023ec241bb70d4896 Name: Garde-main M-LOK avec emprunt de gaz pour AK-50
67d417c023ec241bb70d4896 Description: Un garde-main et un emprunt de gaz pour l'AK-50. Le garde-main est équipé d'une interface standard M-LOK pour l'installation d'équipements supplémentaires, ainsi que d'un rail Picatinny pour le montage de dispositifs tactiques. produit par The AK Guy LTD.
67d41883f378a36c4706eeb7 Name: Frein de bouche .50 BMG pour AK-50
67d41883f378a36c4706eeb7 Description: Un frein de bouche pour l'AK-50. Il réduit le recul et le relèvement du canon. Produit par The AK Guy LTD.
67d418d0ffb910d21f04720e Description: Un chargeur de 10 coups pour le calibre .50BMG pour le fusil de précision M82A1, produit par nBarrett Firearms.
67d41936f378a36c4706eeb9 Description: Une cartouche de calibre .50 BMG (12,7 x 99 mm OTAN) à balle à tête creuse, développée aux États-Unis. Elle possède un pouvoir d'arrêt considérable et peut infliger des dégâts dévastateurs à l'impact. Cependant, en raison de la conception de sa balle à tête creuse, elle ne permet pas de perforer efficacement les protections balistiques.
67dc212493ce32834b0fa446 Description: Une cartouche de calibre .50 BMG (12,7 x 99 mm OTAN) à balle traçante haute visibilité M21, développée aux États-Unis et adoptée en 1923 pour les mitrailleuses Browning M2. Conçue principalement pour détruire des véhicules légèrement blindés et neutraliser le personnel ennemi derrière un couvert léger. Cette munition possède un pouvoir d'arrêt considérable et peut infliger des dégâts dévastateurs à l'impact.
67dc255ee3028a8b120efc48 Description: Une cartouche de calibre .50 BMG (12,7 x 99 mm OTAN) à balle FMJ M33, développée aux États-Unis et adoptée en 1923 pour les mitrailleuses Browning M2. Conçue principalement pour détruire des véhicules légèrement blindés et neutraliser le personnel ennemi derrière un couvert léger. Cette munition possède un pouvoir d'arrêt considérable et peut infliger des dégâts dévastateurs à l'impact.
67dc2648ba5b79876906a166 Description: Une cartouche de calibre .50 BMG (12,7 x 99 mm OTAN) M903 SLAP (Saboted Light Armor Penetrator). Conçue en insérant une balle perforante de 7,62 mm dans un sabot en polymère qui se détache après avoir quitté le canon. Elle possède un pouvoir d'arrêt important et peut infliger des dégâts dévastateurs à l'impact.
67e183377c6c2011970f3149 Description: Quelqu'un a laissé une marque à peine visible sur cette clé, ressemblant à une pelote de fil. Cela dit, elle pourrait tout aussi bien provenir d'un rangement négligé.
67ea616a74f765cefd009fb7 Description: À en juger par ce masque, le Labyrinthe a gravement affecté l'état mental de Tagilla, le rendant encore plus instable et assoiffé de sang. Qui aurait cru qu'il pouvait devenir encore plus fou ? Il semble qu'il ne s'agisse que d'une réplique et qu'elle ne puisse pas être portée. Le masque a probablement été conçu comme un souvenir, destiné à rappeler aux survivants leur rencontre avec un tueur impitoyable.
67ee7680562d5057e60ccc3a Description: A key found in A.P.'s room. It likely opens one of TerraGroup’s corporate apartments.
67ee77389fcc485cf10615f3 Name: Sliderkey flash drive marked with A.P.
67ee77389fcc485cf10615f3 Description: A Sliderkey secure flash drive. These drives are commonly used by TerraGroup management. This one appears to have been used by someone with the initials "A.P.".
67f3fd9bdb1fbd5add090f96 Description: Le journal répertorie les points de rassemblement et les itinéraires pour le transport de personnes vers des bases de scavs réparties dans toute la ville. Selon les instructions destinées aux recruteurs, une campagne de recrutement de mercenaires à grande échelle est en cours de préparation dans Tarkov.
67f90180f07898267b0a4ed7 Description: A signature balaclava of the famous Tarkov hip-hop artist with the Arena Cup Series tournament insignia. The artist hasn't performed in Tarkov for quite a while, but their merch has found a new life.
67f924a9154a04c33b0a3c57 Description: Ce poster montre une fangirl de Killa. Malgré les quelques accrocs sur le papier et les marques de pliage, il est évident que son précédent propriétaire le chérissait énormément.
67f924adb45d94a2600a8cc8 Description: Les femmes ne sont généralement pas autorisées à rejoindre le BEAR ou l'USEC. Malgré le fait que le poster soit endommagé et que le papier soit collant à certains endroits, il ne fait nul doute que la photo est authentique.
67f924b1b07831a6ef0ce317 Name: Poster d'un équipement en cuir inhabituel
67f924b1b07831a6ef0ce317 Description: Il est peu probable qu'un tel équipement soit trouvable dans le Tarkov d'aujourd'hui. À en juger par l'état du poster, il a clairement été fait en temps de paix.
67ff1e209d1f778973073376 Description: An ergonomic trigger for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Black version.
67ff1e2b3e43c3abb701c7c6 Description: An ergonomic trigger for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Gold color version.

6811e9119b009e592c07a59e Description: An audio tape from the apartment of the cult victim. The recording mentions something called the Eye of the World.

681236df5cbf0518e00557a0 Description: An 18 inch handguard for the MCX assault rifle, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Lancer Systems.

68124640c5fd00ec0a01a237 Description: A gas block with a medium length piston designed for the MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.
6819f8df28294ec0730db6b4 Description: A demolition charge equipped with an improvised countdown timer, ready for use.
682315b0f8d8f8681e0744b0 Description: A free-float handguard for the AK-12 assault rifle. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by L.A.C.

682315d08639961c6001dbec Description: A handguard cover from the Sport-12 kit for the AK-12 assault rifle. Manufactured by Zenit.
682317390ee6ef08a60e4547 Description: A proprietary rail that allows installation of tactical equipment. Installed on the Basis series interface. Manufactured by Zenit.
682317428639961c6001dbf1 Description: A proprietary rail that allows installation of tactical equipment. Installed on the Basis series interface. Manufactured by Zenit.
68235b0b7d3ccc3ca20f4d01 Name: AK-12 BRT M24 thread muzzle adapter
68235b0b7d3ccc3ca20f4d01 Description: A muzzle thread adapter that allows installation of various modern AK 5.45x39 muzzle devices on the bayonet type barrel thread of the AK-12 and its civilian versions. Manufactured by BRT.
68305fdc84a12bb973021fc0 Description: A polymer railed handguard for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.
6830601984a12bb973021fc2 Description: A 370mm barrel for the RPD machine gun, custom threaded for .308/7.62x51 muzzle devices.
683060403b1bb49282023611 Description: A polymer buttstock for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.
6830606e84a12bb973021fd0 Name: RPD 7.62x51 DS Arms Belgian Style Muzzle Brake
6830606e84a12bb973021fd0 Description: A Belgian type muzzle brake for the custom threaded .308 barrel for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.
683dacd53a9ebd9a650ce8a0 Description: A great mannequin to help you visualize how the uniform would look on you if you decide to stand guard.
683dadc8675dbd613909cabb Description: The creator of this mannequin was clearly into very bizarre things.
683db01a0dea92512e020550 Description: A pose of a very dominance-asserting NPC.
683dc67e5e8c96c28e0ce6f8 Description: Un plafond blanc avec des incrustations dorées. Quelqu'un s'est donné beaucoup de mal pour peindre ces motifs.
683dc6aa57f38ea79c0073f1 Description: Des murs blancs rendent la planque plus spacieuse. Comme un bureau.
683dc6c1baa42e2bb4024922 Description: Un joli sol de couleur claire. Il aide à éviter la fatigue visuelle et rend la poussière presque invisible.
683ed6aed885538c4102d8c8 Description: Un canon de 24 pouces pour le fusil de précision semi-automatique AK-50.
683ed6c2e4b1dd7ec4069dc8 Description: Un capot pour le boitier du fusil de précision semi-automatique AK-50.
683ed6ccd9a096739b0c9228 Name: Garde-main avec emprunt de gaz pour AK-50
683ed6ccd9a096739b0c9228 Description: Un garde-main M-LOK avec un emprunt de gaz pour le fusil de précision semi-automatique AK-50.
68406efe068a2d99940c1ce3 Description: A solid state drive. Used to store data with enhanced read and write performance.
68418091b5b0c9e4c60f0e7a Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. It has an unusual golden tint to it.
684180bc51bf8645f7067bc8 Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. It has an unusual golden tint to it.
684180ee9b6d80d840042e8a Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Not every PMC can get one of these.
684181208d035f60230f63f9 Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Not every PMC can get one of these.
6841818c20f5c35b53017729 Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. It has an unusual golden tint to it.
6841b11620f5c35b5301772b Description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Not every PMC can get one of these.
6841b179322db20d190b4b99 Description: The girl on the poster is definitely hinting at something. But you're stronger than her urging.
6841b1ff51bf8645f7067bca Description: We all need a loyal friend. Even if just in the arms of a 2d girl.
6841b3463fcc417de40a6768 Description: You need to work really hard to earn this armband.
6841b3ab322db20d190b4b9b Description: An armband available only to a handful of people in Tarkov.
6841b6b674a3c16f5e03d653 Description: This Tarko figurine depicts a very green PMC just setting foot in the city. There must be two more like this one out there somewhere.
6841c50c3fcc417de40a676a Description: Les corbeaux sont des oiseaux intelligents. Mais sous forme d’image, ils ne pourront certainement pas vous berner. À moins que ?
6841c7963fcc417de40a676c Description: Une cible pour ceux à qui manquent les jeux de bar.
6841c7f03fcc417de40a676e Description: Une cible pour les chasseurs de vermine.
684696e8199c6a77dc0f9bc8 Description: La voix d’un opérateur USEC venu de loin jusqu’à Tarkov. Il est fort, expérimenté, et prêt au combat.
6846990ed5d969efe3078408 Description: A voice of the PMC BEAR operator who has seen this life through and is only looking for one last thing.
68540a07961c6f351f04d917 Description: A standard serially produced 660mm barrel with built-in iron sights for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.
68540a100103119fd00e115a Description: A standard serially produced 750mm barrel with a vent rib for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.
68540aae1e5c6ff6f1051477 Description: A well-known muzzle device commonly called "The Bulgarian" in Russia. Its reverse-cone shape makes it highly effective at reducing muzzle flash, and it also slightly lessens the concussive effect when firing indoors. Compatible with any caliber from 5.45 to 7.62 on the AK-74 platform, or with the appropriate adapter on AKM or AK-12 assault rifles.
68666482abad2f29b00aab57 Description: A broken generic phone, nothing out of the ordinary. However it might help to find Mechanic's acquaintance.
686665484c6f39163e076c3d Description: A piece of a map found on a Scav. Will it lead to trouble or great riches? Time will tell.
6866663e022740fabd074ef2 Description:
An unremarkable diary, there are hundreds of those in Tarkov. But don't judge a book by its cover: this particular one contains many dangerous secrets.

The first page has a table of contents:
• Update
• Notes 
• Highlights
• Encrypt
• Agenda 
• Ruminates
• Drafts
6866665cdf54e1190902df55 Description:
A perfect duplicate of the programmer's diary. How Mechanic achieved such resemblance and why is a mystery.

The first page has a table of contents:
• Update
• Notes 
• Highlights
• Encrypt
• Agenda 
• Ruminates
• Drafts
686666db646d47fec3018925 Description: The most ordinary-looking disk. The only thing that catches your eye is the “Ⅰ” written on top. If this is a first disk, then there must be a second one somewhere?
68666887df54e1190902df57 Description: A folder with decrypted data from the military flash drives. Someone out there would give millions for one of these.
6866ad3853330f9b83064cf9 Description: It seems the Black Division operatives have somehow prepared a working access keycard. It should also work on doors at the seaport.
6866adbe09b973bf45094339 Description: This key should fit the gate that blocks access to the pier leading to the evacuation zone.
6871284e9a353bb50606f3ed Name: AS VAL MOD.4 9x39 special assault rifle
6871284e9a353bb50606f3ed Description: AS VAL MOD.4 is the fourth special modification of the integrally suppressed assault rifle, intended for Russian special operations units and task groups. The MOD.4 features improved controls: an enlarged magazine release button, additional safety selector lever, and an integrated custom charging handle. Developed by members of the BEAR Norvinsk brigade.
687128c4505fed5f370b1625 Name: AS VAL NB MOD.4 Kit handguard
687128c4505fed5f370b1625 Description: A custom handguard designed for the AS VAL MOD.4. Features rails for mounting optics, tactical accessories, and foregrips.
68712a7d505fed5f370b1633 Description: A flared magazine well for the AS VAL MOD.4. Enables faster and more precise magazine insertion.
68712b57a1be89347f0d8179 Description: A 3.5 inch rail for the AS VAL MOD.4 handguard. Allows installation of tactical equipment.
68712bd4251b8d4c6c04ec19 Name: AS VAL NB MOD.4 Kit top cover
68712bd4251b8d4c6c04ec19 Description: A custom mount for the AS VAL MOD.4. Allows installation of optics.
68712cafa1be89347f0d817c Description: A muzzle cap for the AS VAL MOD.4 sound suppressor.
68712ce2251b8d4c6c04ec1f Description: An integral barrel-suppressor module for the AS VAL MOD.4.
687502c4660d147e2502a94f Description: A simple disk with a handwritten note that this is the second version, the final one. Finally you can go through the whole game all the way to the end. Gotta write a review later!
68750378555049ec270cdab7 Description: A simple disk with a handwritten note that this is the second version, the final one. Finally you can go through the whole game all the way to the end. Gotta write a review later!
6877c2dcda2a05d0cb04f983 Description: A handwritten note left in the open workspace of the TerraGroup laboratory.
6877c834b52f568d4b0ea5a5 Name: Note on preparations for the Arrival
6877c834b52f568d4b0ea5a5 Description: A torn notebook page detailing preparations for the Arrival.
6877c84d020406d3ea060551 Description: A note from the mechanic at the ARRS station detailing how to roll back the 14-4 KORD station settings to a backup state.
6877c866ae5d3a06a30d7f3f Description: A paint-smeared document containing an order from TerraGroup's main office.
6877c87dd66d08f590036126 Name: Note with ramblings about the Purification
6877c87dd66d08f590036126 Description: A blank TerraGroup sheet with a rough scribble. Doesn't resemble the handwriting of office staff.
6878c143254146e6fd043756 Name: AS VAL 9x39 NB MOD.4 muzzle brake
6878c143254146e6fd043756 Description: A custom muzzle brake for the AS VAL MOD.4.
6878c1c723c3173d7f06d926 Name: AS VAL 9x39 NB MOD.4 JailBrake muzzle device
6878c1c723c3173d7f06d926 Description: A custom muzzle device for the AS VAL MOD.4, installed on the MOD.4 handguard.
6878cc5bd0c26d57bf0aa37a Name: AS VAL Zenit RK-3 pistol grip
6878cc5bd0c26d57bf0aa37a Description: A custom Zenit pistol grip for the AS VAL. Replaces the standard pistol grip.
6878ccf4181ac8a5b5077236 Name: AS VAL NB stock adapter tube
6878ccf4181ac8a5b5077236 Description: An adapter for installing aftermarket buttstocks on the AS VAL.
68889263ea36baf84d085540 Description: A tape from the lecture hall recording one of the TerraGroup meetings.
688893c5a030f9346505e6d5 Description: An audio tape found among the personal belongings of the victim in the cultists' torture chamber. It seems the owner was chosen deliberately.
68889451ad1e91bfa40db8fd Description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the first call from May 11.
688894da0bc983c31509f32a Description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the second call from May 11.
68889504f6192726ac07c66c Description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the third call from May 11.
688895322f6b5b76380e6af5 Description: An audio tape that somehow ended up in the safe at station 14-4 KORD. Either someone slipped it in unnoticed when the server room’s cooling system was activated, or they already knew what would happen.
6888954ba66a069e0405a9aa Name: SVT-40 Addley Precision Smith-less Scope Mount
6888954ba66a069e0405a9aa Description: A scope mount designed for the SVT-40. Manufactured by Addley Precision.
6888958794cca0a80b070ae9 Description: An audio tape recording the conversations between the Gnezdo outpost fighters and the Bogatyr squad.
6888965ac122cae7a20765fa Description: This recording seems to capture one of Voevoda’s reflections on the causes of the Tarkov conflict.
688896b3ea36baf84d085544 Description: This audio tape contains a recording recovered from Moreman’s damaged phone.
68889737562720383f0f8548 Description: One of the recordings from Moreman’s damaged phone was successfully transferred onto this audio tape.
688897992f6b5b76380e6af9 Description: The final recording of a TerraGroup scientist who locked himself in the Labyrinth observation room.
688897e094cca0a80b070aed Description: An audio tape prepared by Kozlov for Anastasia. According to Kozlov’s letters, it contains irrefutable proof of the city administration’s ties to the local criminal underworld.
68889a2f94cca0a80b070af1 Name: BEAR commander's audio tape labeled "For the BEARs"
68889a2f94cca0a80b070af1 Description: An audio tape containing important instructions left by our squad’s commander.
68889aab3fcaf13e48003ba7 Name: USEC commander's audio tape labeled "For the USEC"
68889aab3fcaf13e48003ba7 Description: An audio tape containing important instructions left by our squad’s commander.
68889aca77aeb067290816f1 Description: A personal audio tape on which a USEC operative recorded a conversation with their commander during a rest stop.
68889c930b29b8032504f369 Name: SVT-40 Addley Precision Steel Scope Mount
68889c930b29b8032504f369 Description: A scope mount designed for the SVT-40. Manufactured by Addley Precision.
6888ac0f5978b35e90010b49 Description: A wood stock for the SVT-40/AVT-40 rifles styled after the SVD sniper rifle.
6889e4cd3ff7e9cfbc0c507c Description: An unassuming thumb drive. Contains classified military data which was not taken out of the city in time. It's best to gather as many of these as you can. Just in case.
6889f1c4f7a5d7de7b089550 Description: A 30-round 5.7x28 magazine for the FN Five-seveN pistol. Manufactured by ProMag.
688a0b38467521f9080693a3 Description: A fiber optic red dot sight manufactured by MeproLight. Installed on a proprietary mount.
688a0bf28cdd409ce60911ce Description: A Picatinny/Weaver quick-detach mount base for Mepro series red dot sights. Manufactured by MeproLight.
688b2dba67bf6fa26c07e918 Description: An ordinary toolbox with an unordinary color. Most of the stickers on it are inexistent in Tarkov. Someone has paid a hefty price to smuggle it from outside the cordon.
688b2e574172ca83e70cf868 Description: A unique armband for the most sociable operators.
688b3bfa1ed594eccd0c45ee Description: A unique face mask with an unusual paint job. Guess someone should check their DMs.
688b44cb28bf8d85cd0ff108 Description: The SRO (Specialized Reflex Optic) is a rugged, compact reflex sight. It can be used as a primary or backup optic. Requires a compatible base to mount on Weaver-style rails. Manufactured by Trijicon.
688b4bd81cef2a61d0052738 Description: The SRO (Specialized Reflex Optic) is a rugged, compact reflex sight. It can be used as a primary or backup optic. Requires a compatible base to mount on Weaver-style rails. Manufactured by Trijicon. Flat Dark Earth version.
688b54a11cef2a61d005273b Name: Elcan SpecterDR Mounting Plate for Trijicon
688b54a11cef2a61d005273b Description: A mount base for installation of RMR-type reflex sights on the Elcan SpecterDR scope.
688b79b5eb234c75d900e050 Description: A 9A-91 handguard with a bottom rail for installation of foregrips. Manufactured by TTS System.
688b7b0d934c59b7bf0af0b7 Description: A compact lightweight rail for the TTS System handguard, designed for installation of small optics or tactical devices. Manufactured by TTS System.
688b7c1b0e99e554a90c0fb7 Description: A 2.5 inch rail that allows installation of additional equipment on the TTS System handguard. Manufactured by TTS System.
688c86420e99e554a90c0fd6 Description: A custom handguard for the SR-3M assault rifle made on order from one of the well-known local operatives. Made out of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and fitted with Zenit rails for installation of additional tactical equipment.
688c9df121038434840a1e06 Name: AK JMac Customs RSA-5.5 stock adapter
688c9df121038434840a1e06 Description: An adapter for installing 1913 Picatinny buttstocks, designed for AK-style assault rifles with 5.5mm pin folding stocks. Manufactured by JMac Customs.
688cbdc341e2a57a8f0c1c6c Name: AK Samson Rear Trunnion Folding Stock Adapter
688cbdc341e2a57a8f0c1c6c Description: A 1913 stock adapter, designed for installation on AK-series assault rifles. Manufactured by Samson Manufacturing.
689166b6c2d6fa42e7044756 Description: A variant of the Kalashnikov assault rifle designed for export to countries whose armies continue to use the 7.62x51 NATO (.308 Win) cartridge as their standard infantry small arms ammunition. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
689166debd91cc17c109c753 Description: A standard-issue handguard for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
68916701bd91cc17c109c758 Description: A 20-round 7.62x51 NATO magazine for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
689167248f19dbc8190728ed Description: A standard receiver dust cover with an integrated Picatinny rail for AK-308 assault rifles. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
68916765fa628c6b9f0ed6f6 Description: A standard-issue removable rear sight base mount for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
689167d79f03ec70cb0ea066 Description: A standard-issue 7.62x51 NATO flash hider for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.
6891bb203bbad2a6230f9be8 Description: A note in which someone scolds a USEC operative for poor weapon maintenance.
6891bb67f674f551000a38d3 Name: Escape route map from the TerraGroup office area
6891bb67f674f551000a38d3 Description: A map showing USEC retreat points from the TerraGroup office area. Judging by the tags, it was intercepted by the BEARs after the EMP blast.
6891bb83d7502d512502d160 Description: A newspaper issue featuring an article on the escalating conflict in Tarkov.
6891bb9f81d0bf37b10249f4 Description: A mysterious note mentioning the EMP blast that occurred over the TerraGroup office.
68935269af943a06e8038c58 Description: A 24-round polymer magazine for the Saiga-308 carbine and AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by ProMag.
689479a4a733b1602007e2eb Name: Spiritus Systems LV-119 Plate Carrier (Black Division V1)
689479a4a733b1602007e2eb Description: A highly customizable modular plate carrier by Spiritus Systems, built for maximum comfort in combat. Wolf Grey version. This setup allows full freedom of movement while providing an ergonomic layout for ammunition and essential gear.
689479cb47e5acd1e10be986 Name: Ferro Concepts FCPC V5 Plate Carrier (Black Division)
689479cb47e5acd1e10be986 Description: The fifth-generation FCPC plate carrier continues Ferro Concepts’ focus on lightweight, adaptable gear. In this version, the plate bags and carrier contour have been redesigned for improved comfort and mobility. Coyote Brown version. Equipped with two radios for communicating with both the assigned squad and HQ.
689479eb30cc5ba7be00f5ff Name: Spiritus Systems LV-119 Plate Carrier (Black Division V2)
689479eb30cc5ba7be00f5ff Description: A highly customizable modular plate carrier by Spiritus Systems, built for maximum comfort in combat. Black version. This setup is equipped with breaching charges and multiple GP pouches for maximum equipment flexibility.
68947a4be4bf255d1b0ca746 Name: First Spear Siege-R Optimized M.A.S.S. Plate Carrier (Black Division)
68947a4be4bf255d1b0ca746 Description: A Siege-R Optimized plate carrier equipped with the M.A.S.S. Shoulder System. Provides reliable all-around protection while offering ample workspace for equipment placement. Black version.
68947a8ce4bf255d1b0ca759 Name: Tasmanian Tiger Modular Pack 45 Plus (MultiCam Black)
68947a8ce4bf255d1b0ca759 Description: The TT Modular Pack 45 is a system that can be customized to suit the user’s needs. The top flap can be raised to increase capacity or removed entirely if required. External straps allow attachment of bulky gear or equipment that needs to remain easily accessible. MultiCam Black version.
68947ab5a733b1602007e2fe Description: This Mystery Ranch backpack is designed for short missions of up to two days. Its compact size is offset by excellent ergonomics. External straps provide convenient attachment points for tools and gear you might need on the go.
68947ad3e4bf255d1b0ca75c Name: Mystery Ranch NICE Frame Load Sling
68947ad3e4bf255d1b0ca75c Description: The Load Sling by Mystery Ranch allows to carry heavy, irregularly shaped cargo. Its strap system secures items safely and reliably, while the external MOLLE straps provide versatile attachment points for smaller gear. This particular model is equipped with a spacious case offering extra protection.
68948a95d8f2b85fb705e2a6 Description: The 6B45 body armor, designed to protect personnel from shrapnel and small arms fire. Part of the Ratnik equipment system and has been in production since the 2010s as a replacement for the 6B43 model.
68948ad72c87773b9f06d73f Description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup gives the user a compact yet versatile space for carrying essential gear.
68948aebd8f2b85fb705e2b0 Description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup allows for convenient placement of essential combat medical supplies and communication equipment.
68948b118c57a8a52301d7ae Description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup provides maximum space for carrying magazines and grenades.
6895bb82c4519957df062f82 Name: Radian Weapons Model 1 FA 5.56x45 assault rifle
6895bb82c4519957df062f82 Description: Radian Model 1 Full Auto, an AR-15 platform assault rifle chambered for 5.56x45 NATO. The rifle is positioned as a reliable, high-quality, and accurate system for professional and sporting use. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.
6895bd19d55f0ebf6a0c0306 Description: A precision CNC machined 14 inch handguard, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.
6895becad55f0ebf6a0c0311 Name: AR-15 Radian Weapons Model 1 5.56x45 upper receiver
6895becad55f0ebf6a0c0311 Description: A precision CNC machined upper receiver for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.
6895bf08e2d16810ba0bf43e Name: AR-15 Radian Weapons Raptor-SD charging handle
6895bf08e2d16810ba0bf43e Description: An ambidextrous charging handle for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.
689b3fffa1295e322207a677 Description: The Gatorz Specter glasses provide full eye protection and are designed to be worn with helmets, headsets, or ear protection.
689b404db49f27df1c0873f6 Description: The SOTR respirator was developed by Gentex to protect operators from hazardous airborne compounds and particles, intended for use only in ground operations. Provides reliable filtration against most harmful particles, including lead, asbestos, lubricants, and smoke from burning materials.
689b4d39987b304021088e8d Description: A printout of the transcript from the pilots of the downed aircraft.
689b4ed2987b304021088e8f Description: A note with a warning from an unknown sender.
689b4f338dbf3fd40f0bc778 Description: A TerraGroup instruction manual included with Kruglov's RFID card.
689b4f5f6035689a0c0724ce Name: Transcript of conversation with Ms. A.
689b4f5f6035689a0c0724ce Description: A printout of miss A.'s conversation with an unidentified individual.
689b5072665c386d9c007a41 Name: Folder with intelligence on Norvinsk region facilities
689b5072665c386d9c007a41 Description: A TerraGroup report compiling information on government facilities in the Norvinsk region.
689b5093987b304021088e91 Description: The note mentions the delivery of some goods near the lighthouse.
689b50ec127673bbd40706d1 Name: Document on changes in enterprise interactions
689b50ec127673bbd40706d1 Description: A TerraGroup document detailing updated procedures for working with contractors. Some of the information has been blacked out.
689b5108304455f61a0bc298 Description: A fax containing instructions for moving a certain shipment. Some of the information has been blacked out with a marker.
689b512b075404ce7e09ec12 Description: A printout of correspondence recovered from the hard drive in A.P.’s car.
689b514c886e9848a4085915 Description: A transport log with handwritten markings. It's clear the cargo was never meant to go through official channels.
689b5187665c386d9c007a43 Description: A TerraGroup report on fuel catalyst tests conducted at Chemical Plant #16.
689b51b2987b304021088e93 Description: A handwritten note left at the guard post.
689b5218533aa51a060f810a Description: A paint-smeared document with no stamps or logos.
689b5256147eeab4410ecd14 Description: A paint-smeared document with no stamps or logos.
689b52892c175da5bf083ba1 Name: Copy of report for TG Worldwide
689b52892c175da5bf083ba1 Description: A copy of the report intended for the TerraGroup headquarters. Smeared in ink.
689b52d6886e9848a4085917 Description: The full specification for Item #1156, intended for transport from Tarkov to Norvinsk.
689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16 Name: Note about the Eye of the World
689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16 Description: A cultist's note mentioning something called the Eye of the World.
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3 Description: A homemade book filled with notes and drawings about witnesses of the Arrival, The Unheard, and the end of the old world.
689b536a4b553916720119aa Description: A note in which the programmer writes about how they became one of the Witnesses of the Arrival.
689b53952b1ac3b0810b7fe0 Description: A note from an NGO Cobalt specialist who was hiding from the cultists.
689b53b7127673bbd40706d3 Name: Newspaper clipping from the cultists' house
689b53b7127673bbd40706d3 Description: A newspaper clipping featuring an article about the NGO Cobalt. It seems the cultists took a great interest in this organization.
689b53ef987b304021088e95 Description: A full specification for the ARRS system. Most of it is encrypted.
689b5f0f986634d56b0e099f Description: A poster that someone left right outside the door of your Hideout. A limited edition item. It'll remind you of all the time you spent in front of your monitor.
689b880fff8b4adc420f5b56 Description: The gas mask from Avon Protection was developed under the JSGPM (Joint Service General Purpose Mask) program to provide special operations forces with maximum protection against CBRN threats while keeping the design lightweight and comfortable for use in a wide range of conditions.
689b8883b49f27df1c0873f8 Description: A universal adjustable night vision mounting system manufactured by Wilcox. Features a breakaway lever that disconnects under stress to prevent user injury. Compatible with most night vision shrouds and adapters. Coyote version.
689b889473ebd6871805edd6 Description: A very lightweight and ergonomic night vision device manufactured by L3Harris. Provides an optimal field of view and a clear image not only in low-light conditions but also in the presence of bright light sources. Equipped with Butler Creek flip-open lens protectors. White Phosphor tubes version.
689c887cd18a3665b8045743 Description: A modern lightweight tactical weapon light, installed on special compatible mounts. Manufactured by SureFire.
689c8981bce76ccfbf01862f Name: SureFire M600 Scout Light Thumbscrew Mount
689c8981bce76ccfbf01862f Description: A Picatinny/Weaver mount for M600/M300 series weapon lights. Manufactured by SureFire.
689c8a2b4b91399db3085f27 Description: A weapon light mount designed for KeyMod interface. Manufactured by Arisaka.
689c8b454b91399db3085f2a Description: A weapon light mount designed for M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Arisaka.
689dbded6c7e684817080c29 Description: A universal adjustable night vision mounting system manufactured by Wilcox. Features a breakaway lever that disconnects under stress to prevent user injury. Compatible with most night vision shrouds and adapters. Black version.
68a5ab09c44fa287ba0a97b5 Description: A rugged reflex sight made for withstanding harsh environmental conditions, compatible with NVGs and various weapon builds. Manufactured by FALKE.
68a5ac69b55a6b93c20a2bc7 Description: A rugged everyday carry reflex sight, made for use on pistols, carbines, or shotguns. Can be used as a main or backup sight, requires a corresponding Weaver mount. Manufactured by SwampFox.
68a5dc0c2cd64a8b58023b87 Description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Black version.
68a5dc4eed35a7eac1048ff6 Name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 8.5 inch handguard
68a5dc4eed35a7eac1048ff6 Description: An 8.5 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.
68a639748e1fe612970728e9 Description: An American-made 5.56x45mm assault rifle developed by Colt in the late 1960s as an improved variant of the original AR-15/M16 design. The M16A1 became the standard service rifle of the US military during the Vietnam War, featuring a forward assist and other refinements for reliability in harsh conditions. Though considered outdated by modern standards, it remains a durable and accurate weapon prized by collectors and shooters alike.
68a6399922b1e0bd360afe56 Description: A later evolution of the M16 platform, the M16A2 introduced a burst-fire mechanism, improved iron sights, handguard and buttstock for greater control and durability. Chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition, it served as the primary service rifle for the U.S. military throughout the 1980s and 1990s. Known for its precision and dependability, the M16A2 remains a benchmark for modern assault rifle design.
68a63a9522b1e0bd360afe5f Name: AR-15 Colt early type charging handle
68a63a9522b1e0bd360afe5f Description: An early type charging handle for AR-15 and compatible systems, manufactured by Colt.
68a63ac58e1fe612970728f2 Description: A 20 inch (508mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Corresponds with standard service M16A2 barrel.
68a63b03e1fb670852024656 Name: AR-15 Colt USGI A1 3-prong 5.56x45 flash hider
68a63b03e1fb670852024656 Description: A three-prong flash hider for the AR-15 series rifles, manufactured by Colt. The classic earlier A1 variant made in the 60s, which was later replaced by the more famous Bird Cage type.
68a63b73c92ee33ffa01bf57 Description: A classic 20-round 5.56x45 magazine for AR-15. Manufactured by Colt.
68a63b90e1fb670852024659 Description: An upper receiver for the M16A1E1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. An early prototype variant between the M16A1 and M16A2, which also served as the basis for the Canadian C7. During the 1980s it was widely fitted to various special carbines produced by Colt.
68a63b9b8e1fe612970728f7 Description: An upper receiver for the M16A2 assault rifle manufactured by Colt.
68a63bc422b1e0bd360afe61 Description: A standard-issue buttstock for the early-issue M16A1 assault rifles, compatible with AR-15 and AR-10 platforms.
68a63c1fc92ee33ffa01bf5a Description: The A2 type buttstock for the AR-15. Standard-issue for M16A2 assault rifles. Manufactured by Colt.
68a63c5ce1fb670852024661 Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.
68a63c7322b1e0bd360afe65 Description: A telescopic buttstock, second generation of the classic stock for CAR-15. Manufactured by Colt.
68a63c998e1fe612970728fe Description: A rubber buttpad for the Colt N1 series stocks, improves ergonomics and cushions felt recoil. Manufactured by John Masen Co.
68a63cb3e1fb670852024664 Description: A triangular fiberglass rifle handguard manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A1 rifles.
68a63cc0c92ee33ffa01bf5c Description: A polymer rifle handguard manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A2 rifles.
68a63ccc8a85019a82087956 Description: An old-style carbine length "skinny" handguard manufactured by Colt.
68a63cdac92ee33ffa01bf5f Description: A quad-rail handguard manufactured by Knight's Armament Company. Standard-issue handguard for the M16A4 rifle.
68a63ce2e1fb670852024667 Name: AR-15 KAC M5 RAS lower handguard
68a63ce2e1fb670852024667 Description: A bottom rail part of the M5 RAS handguard. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
68a63d1522b1e0bd360afe67 Name: AR-15 ProMag Delta Style scope mount
68a63d1522b1e0bd360afe67 Description: A scope mount that fits over the AR-15 carry handle. Modeled after the mount from the 1990s. Manufactured by ProMag.
68a63d3c8e977b40b2032286 Description: A back-up iron sight manufactured by MaTech Solutions.
68a63d4f22b1e0bd360afe6a Description: An older style polymer pistol grip manufactured by Colt.
68a6413b54ef229c4d089238 Description: A bottom part of the A2 handguard, manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A2 rifles.
68a641452258a88280055616 Name: AR-15 Colt CAR-15 Skinny lower handguard
68a641452258a88280055616 Description: A bottom part of the CAR-15 handguard, manufactured by Colt.
68a6d95addf0111c2f04c9c3 Description: A basic orange construction hard hat designed to make you stand out. But is that really what you want out here?
68a6d96fddf0111c2f04c9c9 Description: A white construction hard hat built to stop falling bricks. Will it stop a bullet? Test at your own risk.
68a6e8fd4ac5b037cb0e9b86 Description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Black version.
68a6f3b27279296357007cd7 Name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 11 inch handguard
68a6f3b27279296357007cd7 Description: An 11 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.
68a6fbb07279296357007ce2 Name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 15 inch handguard
68a6fbb07279296357007ce2 Description: A 15 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.
68a6fbfdd31595bb360c73bd Name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 17 inch handguard
68a6fbfdd31595bb360c73bd Description: A 17 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.
68a6ff732885e0bbd30bb6f9 Description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Yellow version.
68a6ff952885e0bbd30bb6fd Description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Red version.
68a6fff085a17dc1cb008066 Description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Yellow version.
68a7000d7708ac5120060527 Description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Red version.
68a85ab8ef22d08bf401fa68 Description: Taking its name from an Old Norse Viking term for a lightning raid, Strandhögg was one of the first formalized battle tactics to use covert infiltrators in advance of an actual raiding operation. Strandhögg was a tactical game-changer in its time, just like the technological advances First Spear is bringing forward in this line of plate carriers. US Air Force ABU pattern camouflage version.
68a85ac615a5769d50029cd9 Name: ANA Tactical Alpha chest rig (A-TACS AU)
68a85ac615a5769d50029cd9 Description: "Alpha" is a high-quality chest rig that fully meets the military standards for reliability and functionality. The combination of integrated pouches and MOLLE straps provides the means of carrying a large number of necessary equipment. The vest is designed as a classic chest rig. In this type of vest, all the gear is located in the front and side parts, while the back part is comprised of adjustment belts and straps. Manufactured by ANA Tactical. A-TACS AU camouflage version.
68a86bd51d1284a8e20e39d5 Description: An 11.5 inch (292mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo.
68a89146212dbbeead0d5636 Name: NFM THOR Concealable Reinforced Vest body armor (Head Eyes)
68a89146212dbbeead0d5636 Description: A low-profile body armor manufactured by NFM. A version for those who really feel the Tarkov atmosphere.
68a89942431252e29a02dbf6 Description: The Interceptor vest consists of a fabric Outer Tactical Vest (OTV) with dorsal and thoracic pockets and two protective ceramic-composite SAPI or ESAPI inserts. The Outer Tactical Vest (OTV) is a basic vest equipped with aramid fabric pouches that protect against ammunition fragments and 9mm handgun bullets. Woodland camouflage version.
68a97093431252e29a02dc06 Description: The NPP KlASS Korund-VM heavy bulletproof vest, adopted by the units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia. Kamysh camouflage version.
68a986615db8a4a66404ff9a Description: This chest rig platform is designed for placing equipment in the chest and abdomen areas, with an open back. Includes integrated pouches, designed for 8 magazines. Can be used both separately and on top of the armor vest. Manufactured by WARTECH. Moss camouflage version.
68a986ca5c0073fa2d0d8cb8 Description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Too big for pool.
68a98762609a5cb2120ebd26 Description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Would match well with a motorbike and leather jacket.
68a987a1609a5cb2120ebd2f Description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Your head is basically invisible with this camouflage.
68a99207aa809946e507c2f6 Name: Stich Profi Plate Carrier V2 (MARPAT Woodland)
68a99207aa809946e507c2f6 Description: An improved lightweight version of the standard plate carrier manufactured by Stich Profi. MARPAT Woodland camouflage version.
68a9a04373d52d47830759c7 Name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Loui Peeton)
68a9a04373d52d47830759c7 Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. Draws eyes and makes the poor cry.
68a9a0b01696fb8c1e0ee9cc Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. A bright warning that the user is dangerous for the environment.
68a9a1223e1ee5a70504c126 Name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Crash Tested)
68a9a1223e1ee5a70504c126 Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. This mask has passed the test.
68a9a15d73d52d47830759c9 Name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Demonic Face)
68a9a15d73d52d47830759c9 Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. Has all the qualities of a top arena fighter – stylish, luxurious, and intimidating all at once.
68a9a85c3e1ee5a70504c12e Description: A Japan-styled tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full NIJ level IIIA protection of the whole head, though you really don't want to get shot in the face with this thing. Comes with an intimidating print.
68a9a92b838d65bcb3050176 Description: A Japan-styled tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full NIJ level IIIA protection of the whole head, though you really don't want to get shot in the face with this thing. Painted in green with red and black accents.

68aee763130c00663d08aea8 Description: The TKPD (Tyazhelyy Karabin Podderzhki Dragunova - "Dragunov Heavy Support Carbine") is a modernized SVDK chambered in 9.3x64mm, commissioned by PMC BEAR. The weapon is noted for high accuracy and effectively suppresses targets at medium ranges. Manufactured by SniperArms Dynamics.

The bullet delivers increased stopping power at medium ranges and is intended for hunting large game, as it provides strong terminal performance and can cause severe incapacitating wounds on impact.

This cartridge is most commonly used for sport shooting, training, and zeroing, and is sometimes used for hunting when minimal damage to game is desired.

68c954d8ecbf3abc9907ee9b Description: A trophy for participating in Season 1 of the BattlePass. Another crate assembled by Ref, filled with various gear to help endure the hardships of life in Tarkov. Can only be opened in the Arena, under Ref’s watchful eye.

68caace5f42a4476cf0be2b4 Description: A top ring cap for the A.R.M.S. #22 mount.
68caacf7c8ac87b10507c5a9 Description: A universal rail mount for installation of various red dot sights or tactical equipment on the A.R.M.S. #22 optic mount, installed as replacement for standard ring cap.

68caad7f933990601c07f47c Description: Precise, accurate, durable and dependable - the Mark 4 MR/T TS-30A2 rifle scope. The model provides 2.5-8x magnification giving you a clear idea of the actual size of the targeted object.
68cc09872bdcc15c010c2668 Description: This restored pass should now be able to unlock Station 14-4 KORD.
68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47 Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Round Carbon 12 inch handguard (FDE)
68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47 Description: The 12 inch GEN III Round Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems. Manufactured by Precision Reflex. Flat Dark Earth version.
68d152b9915f131d4e05ee6c Description: An old voice recorder that, apparently, was used by Voevoda himself.
68d159d46c606e46b605094d Description: A mounting system designed to install the N-15 series night vision goggles to Dovetail type helmet mounts. Manufactured by Armasight.
68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786 Name: Miller Bros. Blades M-2 Tactical Sword (Brown)
68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786 Description: The "M-2" short tactical sword, manufactured by Miller Bros. Blades. Brown vesion.
68d271fc17de6a40270d5657 Description: A personal phone belonging to one of the Bogatyr squad members. Some data may still remain on it.
68d2f09fb350a6169f04bea9 Description: A threatening note left on the door.
68d2f1318c12620073059930 Description: A crumpled note stained with machine oil.
68d2f302be7c1493b90cd3f5 Description: A note from a certain Nagano'98.
68d2f3375f98276b7503c32e Description: A note from Reshala's crew mentioning Kozlov's address.
68d2f400be7c1493b90cd3f7 Description: An issue featuring a story about the unexpected PMC rescue.
68d2f44df63f06b7590ce30e Description: An issue featuring a story about the mysterious Mushroom Picker.
68d2f4aff8817df4690db3d1 Description: A postal envelope without a letter, taken from a courier and unsealed immediately.
68d2f4fc17b59ead010894b6 Description: A letter taken from courier Pasha by Reshala’s people.
68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab Name: Newspaper clipping with a photo of Anastasia
68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab Description: It seems Kozlov left a message on the back of the photograph.
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b Name: Tarkov Herald newspaper with article by A. Mikhailova
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b Description: This issue features an article on the preparation of an important investigation by the journalist A. Mikhailova.
68d2f69e91c2fa84e2044a08 Description: Someone tore a note containing a number or code. Without the other half, it’s useless.
68d2f6dbf8817df4690db3d3 Description: The second half of the note contains only two digits. It seems to be a radio frequency or some kind of code.
68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d Name: BEAR note from the outpost behind Ultra
68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d Description: Someone left their notes at the Gnezdo outpost.
68d2f77e5f98276b7503c330 Description: One of the BEARs in the Gnezdo camp clearly tried to triangulate Bogatyr squad's signal. According to the map, the signal came from the eastern part of the nature reserve.
68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f Name: Voevoda's photo with a cultist mark
68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f Description: Someone circled Voevoda with a marker and left instructions for the cultists on the back.
68d2f96e0c834c20c00a81d8 Description: The note mentions Yastreb and preparations for the ambush on the Bogatyr squad. It seems Prapor was somehow involved in the operation.
68d2f9bd2ca1a737d107b84d Description: This cultists' note mentions the General, as well as the Lighthouse Warden.
68d2fa018c12620073059932 Description: A note containing an order from a commander known as Leshy.
68d2fa3abe7c1493b90cd3f9 Description: The note mentions experiments on central nervous system stability, conducted on human subjects.
68d2fa6d4aae290cf704e371 Description: According to the note, the test subjects were deliberately driven to psychosis.
68d2fa9b691b7c7b34046367 Description: The note describes experiments aimed at altering the test subjects' biological clocks.
68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c Name: Assistant's notes on Group #3 and Group #10
68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c Description: It seems that during the experiments in The Labyrinth, TerraGroup couldn’t dispose of the test subjects’ bodies fast enough.
68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b Name: Assistant's notes on TG-Vi-24 test subjects
68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b Description: A note in which the lab assistant reports on the condition of the test subjects involved in project TG-Vi-24.
68d2fc914aae290cf704e373 Description: A letter from Kozlov that has been sitting in the mailbox.
68d2fd018c12620073059934 Description: A letter from Kozlov's room that he never managed to send.
68d2fd582ca1a737d107b84f Description: Notes from Leshy, detailing his mapping of The Labyrinth and reports on events following the assault.
68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5 Description: Voronenko's report details the experiments TerraGroup conducted on humans in The Labyrinth.
68d301e75f98276b7503c332 Description: The report details FSB monitoring of Chepyga. Someone added a handwritten note to it.
68d302814aae290cf704e375 Description: The documents describe several operations carried out by the Bogatyr squad.
68d3037c91c2fa84e2044a0d Description: The report details how Voevoda conducted the hostage rescue operation at the Tarbank branch.
68d3041818d70f97e704ad7b Description: The report from The Unheard states that their agents have already infiltrated government structures in multiple countries and hold influence beyond Russia.
68d3054f0c834c20c00a81da Description: The file notes Moreman’s service locations and personality traits.
68d3059318d70f97e704ad7f Description: According to the file, Voevoda has a very impressive service record.
68d305c35f98276b7503c336 Description: The file shows that Taran is younger than the other members of the squad, but still has considerable combat experience.
68d305fc8c12620073059936 Description: It seems Strelets possessed exceptional shooting skills, which is why he didn’t change his specialty despite his age.
68d41e65a706eba9a204ed27 Description: The owner of this armband never uncovered the true reasons behind Tarkov’s disaster. But he survived, and in the end that was all that mattered.
68d41f017cb8c03da8079004 Description: Those who wear this armband once agreed to a compromise that came at far too high a cost.
68d41fb0a1c275dbaa0798bf Description: This armband marks the PMC operatives who could never break free from their Tarkov past.
68d41fde2937f3f17c04864d Description: This armband is worn only by PMCs who managed to uncover the truth in Tarkov’s brutal conditions.
68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3 Name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Loui Peeton)
68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3 Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Comes with a luxury white print.
68d55968ca9935b3f10607a9 Description: A fanny pack made in collaboration with the Loui Peeton fashion house.
68d56685f3d7cd248f0a06d9 Description: A quick-detach sound suppressor for the AK-308 assault rifle, installed on the standard muzzle brake.
68d566b2aa07af2e14059e01 Name: AK-74 5.45x39 Magpul PMAG 30 GEN M3 30-round magazine (FDE)

68d5676f43adc7372a0c8ae0 Description: A standard handguard for the TKPD assault carbine. Allows installation of tactical equipment and a bipod. Flat Dark Earth version.

68d6b3568f9527c33609ce83 Description: Black shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68da4fa81ddecb1cc0077aee Description: A dogtag belonging to the Bogatyr squad member who has seen hundreds of battles.
68da4fe6f0e86677fe06bfe4 Description: Someone fashioned a talisman from a crumpled bullet, either as a keepsake or for luck.
68da51d8f0e86677fe06c9b7 Description: On the back of the postcard, someone wrote: "Love you, waiting for you".
68daab6d1e0a6a3f2f0db279 Description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.
68dbc04cd700686fbf0d77bd Description: A patch of some special BEAR unit.
68deaddfd149b3493e049c13 Description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.
68df97725d4e135b130392c8 Description: A poster showing a PMC who found his way out of Tarkov. He stayed clear of TerraGroup’s affairs and the roots of the conflict, yet still managed to survive and escape.
68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9 Name: To Fall in the Darkness poster
68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9 Description: A poster proving that for those who gave in to temptation, there’s only one path left — into the abyss.
68df977e972cf1e1ec072568 Description: A poster with a lighthouse. Under different circumstances it could have been a symbol of light. Here, it only serves as a reminder of an unpaid debt to a man you can never hide from.
68df9785beba86572e097ce8 Description: A poster showing that even the cruelest evil meets its end when it faces a worthy adversary. And on the ruins, humanity will build a new future.
68df9908972cf1e1ec07256a Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.
68df991142e96f583d042b8a Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.
68df991dbeba86572e097ceb Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.
68df9927a38a5e37d80df6c9 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.

68df9a053772634bf40f4f18 Description: The floor is made of durable materials requiring little upkeep. Just right when survival is the only priority.
68df9a14972cf1e1ec07256c Description: This floor hasn’t been cared for in years. No point trying to restore its original look.
68df9a222e6cd294e908d1eb Description: This floor bears plenty of footprints. But tidying up is pointless — today or tomorrow you’ll have to relocate when the next contract comes in.
68df9a2d3772634bf40f4f1a Description: Judging by the floor, someone keeps this place clean and in order. It feels like somewhere you’d want to come back to.
68df9a925d4e135b130392ce Description: This ceiling doesn’t leak or crumble. A pragmatic choice for those focused on survival.
68df9a9ba38a5e37d80df6cb Description: The ceiling shows plenty of water damage from leaks above. Still, it’s the least of a PMC’s problems once he’s slipped into darkness.
68df9aa45d4e135b130392d0 Description: The ceiling looks decent. Most of the plaster is intact and no major damage is visible. Good enough for a mercenary’s temporary shelter.
68df9aaf637781242a0b22fa Description: Someone leveled the ceiling and refreshed the plaster. Few places left in Tarkov could feel as cozy as this.
68df9abc5d4e135b130392d2 Description: The material for these walls was scavenged somewhere in Tarkov’s back alleys. Some blocks still carry traces of old street ads.
68df9ac5a38a5e37d80df6cd Description: Dirt and layers of old coatings left a unique pattern on these walls. They could use a good cleaning.
68df9b2642e96f583d042b8c Description: The walls are still covered in chipped and cracked Soviet-era paint. They could be fixed up, but no mercenary invests in a permanent home.
68df9b2e3772634bf40f4f1c Description: The walls are clearly painted with care, not at random. Someone tends to this place as if they still believe in a better ending and a peaceful future for Tarkov.

68f244ae22c8979ee308f4d8 Description: A replica of the Soviet combat knife crafted by Norvinsk masters, based on Finnish and Swedish designs. Originally used as a utility tool and, when necessary, in combat, the Finka earned a reputation for simplicity and reliability. Its design provides a comfortable, secure grip. Today, it serves more as a collectible piece than a practical weapon.

Arena welcome screen description:
Bienvenue dans l'Arène !

C'est ici que votre personnage, un opérateur d'une société militaire privée (SMP), combattra d'autres opérateurs pour la gloire et l'argent.

En raison du chaos du conflit dans la ville de Tarkov, dans la région de Norvinsk, la loi et l’ordre ont été relégués au second plan. C’est l’endroit où de riches observateurs ont choisi d’organiser des combats où les opérateurs des SMP se battront jusqu’au dernier survivant ou travailleront en équipe pour atteindre un certain objectif, qui, bien sûr, leur sera fixé par les Maîtres. 

Si vous ne possédez pas encore Escape From Tarkov, vous pouvez acheter le jeu et y transférer toute votre progression depuis Arena. 
Si vous possédez déjà Escape From Tarkov, tous les progrès réalisés dans Arena (expérience et compétences) compteront également pour votre personnage dans EFT et vice versa. La progression dans EFT compte pour Arena.

Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/6: Diverses configurations uniques et de collection.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Assault: La classe assaut est la plus polyvalente. Les configurations d'équipement de cette classe sont équilibrées et donc adaptées à la plupart des situations de combat.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/CQB: L'Homme de main est la classe la mieux protégée de l'Arène. Elle se démarque par la présence de visières pare-balles et d'un nombre de munitions élevé pour l'arme principale. Les configurations d'équipement pour cette classe sont excellentes pour la défense de position et les combats qui perdurent.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Collection: Des configurations d'équipement débloquées en accomplissant des actions spécifiques dans l'Arène.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Marksman: La classe de tireur de précision est faite pour les combats à distance. Les configurations d'équipement de cette classe possèdent souvent des armes secondaires puissantes et des protections pare-balles raisonnables. Cette classe hautement spécialisée est indispensable dans les Arènes extérieures.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Rating: Les configurations d'équipement classées sont débloquées en atteignant un certain rang dans l'Arène.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Scout: Le classe éclaireur est pour les joueurs qui ont pour devise "grand risque, grand profit". Les configurations d'équipement de cette classe sont principalement équipées de pistolets-mitrailleurs à canon court chargés de munitions perforantes, mais les faibles protections pare-balles ne vous laissent pas le droit à l'erreur.

ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step1: This is your BattlePass level. For each level gained, you earn Battle Points, the special BattlePass currency. To gain a level, you need to complete operational tasks and participate in Arena battles in any game mode.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step2: This is the special BattlePass currency - Battle Points, used to unlock rewards. You can earn the currency by leveling through your BattlePass and completing operational tasks.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step3: You can also earn Battle Points by exchanging Roubles and GP Coins. Exchange offers are updated once every 24 hours.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step4: To earn a reward, you need to have the corresponding BattlePass level and a certain number of Battle Points. Rewards may have additional unlock conditions. For example, unlocking several rewards from the previous page or completing several operational tasks.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step5: All BattlePass items, except for currency and crates, will remain with you after wipes. May fortune be with you on the sands of the Arena!
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Welcome: Here you can track your BattlePass progress and earn new rewards.

ArmoryTutor/LinkedDescription:
La recherche liée vous aide à explorer les liens entre les objets.
Pour les armes, la recherche liée vous montrera ses accessoires, ses munitions et ses chargeurs. Pour les gilets tactiques et porte-plaque, elle vous montrera les plaques compatibles.
ArmoryTutor/LinkedTipDescription: Les accessoires débloqués sont disponibles pour toutes les armes avec lesquels ils sont compatibles.
ArmoryTutor/UnlockDescription:
Vous pouvez acheter des armes en dépensant des roubles ou des pièces GP.
Pour acheter des objets, il vous faut remplir des conditions spécifiques, telles que compléter des tâches quotidiennes ou atteindre un certain niveau.
ArmoryTutor/UnlockTipDescription: Les pièces GP peuvent être obtenues en complétant les tâches opérationnelles données par Ref.

Partie personnalisée
Dans ce mode, vous pouvez créer un match selon vos propres règles ou rejoindre une salle déjà existante.
La progression dans ce mode de jeu n'est pas sauvegardée !
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassAssaultDescripti: Une classe versatile équilibrant attaque et défense
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassInfo:
Each class has different metascore limits. Equip your preset with weapons, 
ammunition, armor, and medical supplies so that each of the bars is within the <color=#63CFAD>green zone</color>.
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassScoutDescription: Une classe offensive avec un accès à des munitions perforantes et des armes à grande cadence de tir
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassSniperDescriptio: Une classe de spécialiste qui combat à distance
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassSqbDescription: Une classe défensive avec une large gamme de protections pare-balles couvrant le corps et la tête
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassTitle: Système de classe et score meta
CustomPresetsTutor/ConsumeDescription: Preset utility bar displays the meta score for medicine, gear rigs, and headsets.
CustomPresetsTutor/ConsumeTipDescription: N'oubliez pas d'ajouter les consommables à la barre d'accès rapide.
CustomPresetsTutor/DefenceDescription:
Preset defense bar displays the meta score for all armor elements and items with protective properties.

EAreaType/CircleOfCultists/Tooltip: Bonus du cercle des cultistes La valeur de chaque objet sacrifié est additionnée. Ce total détermine la valeur des objets reçus en cadeau de la part des cultistes. Si la valeur d'un seul sacrifice dépasse un certain seuil, il y a une chance de recevoir des objets nécessaires pour les quêtes actives et les modules de la planque à améliorer. La valeur des cadeaux est d'autant plus augmentée par les bonus. Les cultistes ne peuvent pas livrer leur cadeau tant que vous êtes dans la planque. Bonus : - Sacrifier une amulette sacrée augmente la valeur du cadeau de {0}% - La compétence Gestion de la planque augmente le bonus de l'amulette sacrée
EAreaType/EquipmentPresetsStand/Tooltip:
Le présentoir peut être équipé avec n'importe quel équipement.

Dans le menu des configurations d'équipement, vous pouvez revêtir rapidement l'équipement d'un des mannequins ou l'échanger avec l'équipement actuellement porté par votre opérateur.

Les objets placés dans le conteneur sécurisé et dans les emplacements spéciaux ne sont pas affectés par la mécanique d'équipement rapide et d'échange d'équipement.
EAreaType/PlaceOfFame/Tooltip: Bonus des dogtags des opérateurs Des bonus sont attribués pour les dogtags des opérateurs qui : - Sont de la faction opposée à la votre - Ne sont pas de votre liste d'amis - Ne faisaient pas partie de votre groupe au moment de l'élimination Chaque niveau de dogtag apporte un bonus de {0}% Le bonus maximum pour un dogtag est {1}%

EFTFinal/Info:
Congratulations! You have successfully completed the final trial. The story has been recorded, and the world has returned to the state it was in before the events at the port terminal.

If you wish to see a different outcome, start again from a clean slate. To do this, you will need to fully reset your profile or obtain Prestige.

It has been a long and challenging journey. Thank you for seeing it through to the end with us.

Offline raid description:
Dans ce mode, vous pouvez vous entraîner hors-ligne seul, ou vous immerger dans un raid co-op avec des amis sans le risque de rencontrer d'autres joueurs. Vous pouvez utiliser ce mode pour explorer les zones, tester vos armes et faire d'autres activités avant d'aller en raid contre d'autres vrais joueurs.
Toutes les mécaniques du mode co-op (météo, IA, boss, etc.) sont identiques à celles en ligne.
OfflineRaid/startasgrouptooltip: Avec cette option sélectionnée, les joueurs débutent le raid côte à côte
OfflineRaidScreen/WarningHeader: Attention ! Votre progression n’est pas sauvegardée en mode entrainement !

Le mode co-op requiert une édition Edge of Darkness ou l'extension co-op du jeu pour tous les joueurs du groupe.
Le raid se déroulera sur des serveurs Escape from Tarkov dédiés.
Groupe Prêt. Lancement de la partie...

PlantLocationDescription: La zone industrielle et les installations de l’usine chimique №16 furent louées illégalement à la société TerraGroup. Pendant les Contract Wars, cette usine est devenue la scène de nombreux affrontements entre l'USEC et le BEAR qui ont determinés le contrôle sur le quartier industriel de Tarkov. Plus tard, dans le sillage du chaos, les locaux de l’usine furent convertis en refuge pour les civils locaux, les scavs, ainsi que les quelques soldat de l'USEC et du BEAR occasionnellement.

PveFirstTime/Message:
Bienvenue dans le mode de jeu zone JcE

Ce mode vous permet de jouer au jeu JcE avec une progression persistante de votre personnage en solo ou entre amis, sans avoir à vous soucier d'être attaquer par d'autres joueurs en raid.

Toutes les mécaniques sont identiques au mode de jeu JcJ.

Bonne chance !

Ranked/Description:
Partie classée
Les parties classées comprennent un équilibrage automatique selon votre rang, vous permettant de prendre part aux matchs les plus équitables et intéressants pour la future cyber league.
Le classement que les joueurs obtiennent dans ce mode peut être utilisé pour déterminer les combattants les plus forts de l'équipe. Certaines configurations d'équipement peuvent être verrouillées en partie classée. Le même classement sera utilisé pour la recherche de partie.

The Khorovod will be complete once all of Prapor's trees are lit.

Sales sum with {0} increased by {1}: Total des transactions avec {0} augmenté de {1}
Savage matchmaker: Entrez en raid en tant que scav, un bandit local avec un équipement aléatoire. Tarkov vous appartient, vous créez les règles !
SavageBannerDescription: Un raid en tant que scav est différent d'un raid en tant qu'opérateur d'une SMP. Les scavs joueurs apparaissent à un endroit et un moment aléatoire au cours d'un raid. La santé et l'équipement du scav seront aléatoires également. S'extraire en tant que scav vous donnera l'opportunité de transférer à votre opérateur SMP n'importe quels objets récupérés au cours du raid. Completer un raid en tant que scav ne transférera pas de points d'expérience à votre opérateur SMP. Mourir en tant que scav n'affectera d'aucune manière votre progression.
Save build before finding parts: Sauvegardez la configuration avant de rechercher des pièces
ScavGroupMaxCountReached: Nombre maximum de joueurs scav dans le groupe dépassé
ScavInventoryScreen/ConfirmSellAll {0}{1: Tous les objets non transférés seront vendus à Fence pour {0} {1}. Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir finir le transfert et vendre le butin restant ?
ScavTimerNotification: Le joueur {0} aura son scav disponible dans {1}
Scavs arrived with loot: Les scavs sont arrivés avec un butin
SearchDescription: La maitrise de la fouille vous permet de fouiller les corps et les conteneurs plus rapidement et efficacement.
SearchLevelingUpDescription: La fouille est améliorée en fouillant des conteneurs.
Select BEAR Character: Vous êtes un opérateur du "Battle Encounter Assault Regiment" (BEAR). Une société militaire privée (SMP) russe composée d'ex-officiers des forces spéciales des anciens états soviétiques. Le BEAR a combattu pour le compte du gouvernement russe au cours des Contract Wars dans le but de révéler les activités illégales de TerraGroup Labs et de mettre un terme au conflit armé avec son sous-traitant, la société militaire privée occidentale USEC.
Select USEC Character: Vous êtes un opérateur de l'USEC, une société militaire privée (SMP) établie offshore et engagée par TerraGroup Labs en qualité de sous-traitant en sécurité. La USEC avait pour mission principale de détruire les preuves de toute activité potentiellement illicite de son employeur et d'empêcher la saisie de ses actifs par le BEAR, la société militaire privée engagée par le gouvernement russe pour enquêter sur les opérations de TerraGroup.

Settings/Graphics/CloudsQualityTooltip: Vous permet d'ajuster manuellement les paramètres de qualité des nuages pour obtenir l'équilibre souhaité entre les performances et les effets visuels.
Settings/Graphics/DLSSModeTooltip: Le DLSS exploite des techniques de rendu avancé basées sur l’IA pour produire une qualité d’image maximale aux paramètres graphiques maximum. Le DLSS nécessite une carte graphique NVIDIA RTX.
Settings/Graphics/DLSSWrongSampling: Désactivez le ré-échantillonnage : pour activer le DLSS
Settings/Graphics/FSR2LockThis: Ce paramètre est indisponible lorsque le FSR 2.2 est activé
Settings/Graphics/FSR2ModeTooltip: AMD Fidelity FX Super Resolution 2.2 (FSR) est une nouvelle version de la technologie de mise à l'échelle des images qui permet d'augmenter les performances avec une perte minimale de la qualité de l'image finale
Settings/Graphics/FSR3LockThis: Ce paramètre est indisponible lorsque le FSR 3.0 est activé
Settings/Graphics/FSR3ModeTooltip: AMD Fidelity FX Super Resolution 3.0 (FSR) est une nouvelle version de la technologie de mise à l'échelle des images qui permet d'augmenter les performances avec une perte minimale de la qualité de l'image finale.
Settings/Graphics/FSRModeTooltip: AMD Fidelity FX Super Resolution (FSR) est une technologie de mise à l'échelle des images qui permet d'augmenter les performances avec une perte minimale de la qualité de l'image finale
Settings/Graphics/FSRTooLowResolution: La résolution d'écran est trop faible pour ce paramètre
Settings/Graphics/MipStreamingBufferTool: La quantité de RAM qui est allouée pour charger des textures à une qualité donnée. Plus la quantité est importante, plus la charge maximale du disque est élevée et plus le chargement de toutes les textures nécessaires est rapide.
Settings/Graphics/MipStreamingIOLimitToo: Plus il est élevé, plus la vitesse de chargement des textures est rapide. Sur les bons disques, cela augmente la charge sur le disque dur. Sur les disques lents, cela peut entraîner une longue file d'attente d'opérations et un chargement plus lent des textures.
Settings/Graphics/ResetWarning: Les paramètres graphiques ont été réinitialisés à leur valeur par défaut.
Settings/OpticSensitivity: Sensibilité de l'ajustement du zoom des optiques
Settings/Regions/AutoRegions: Utiliser la détection automatique des serveurs
